abstract: Andrew Loupe takes one-stroke lead at Wells Fargo Championship in Charlotte, NC; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Loupe took a one-stroke lead over Roberto Castro at eight under par at the Wells Fargo Championship in Charlotte, N.C.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Golf; Loupe Leads by a Stroke
headline.main: Andrew Loupe Leads by a Stroke
